#summary This is a help file for the Magma element.

= Magma =

Magma is an extremely hot particle that acts like a liquid. Magma has a lot of fun reactions. When combined with Water it creates [Steam] and [Stone]. When combined with Sand it creates [Glass]. When combined with [Mud], it produces [Stone] and [Steam]. It also works very well as an ignition device for [Fuse].
